title: Contoso Internal: AI Fundamentals for Leaders & PMs
provider: Contoso AI Center of Excellence (Internal L&D)

content.course_description: This foundational course provides Contoso leaders and project managers with a comprehensive overview of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning concepts, terminology, common use cases, potential business value, and ethical considerations. It aims to demystify AI and equip non-technical leaders to effectively collaborate with AI teams and oversee AI initiatives.
learning_objectives: Understand core AI/ML concepts (e.g., supervised/unsupervised learning, deep learning, NLP).
Identify potential AI use cases within Contoso business units.
Learn the typical lifecycle of an AI/ML project.
Recognize key challenges in AI projects (data quality, bias, model interpretability).
Understand Contoso's Responsible AI principles and governance framework.
Communicate effectively with data scientists and ML engineers.
